description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB Table role assignments.

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment create
commands.summary: Create a Table role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment create --account-name
                                         --principal-id
                                         --resource-group
                                         --scope
                                         [--role-assignment-id]
                                         [--role-definition-id]
                                         [--role-definition-name]
examples:
az cosmosdb table role assignment create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-name "My Read Only Role" \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506

az cosmosdb table role assignment create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39 \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment delete
commands.summary: Delete a Table role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment delete --account-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --role-assignment-id
                                         [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb table role assignment delete --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment exists
commands.summary: Check if an Azure Cosmos DB role assignment exists.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment exists --account-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --role-assignment-id
examples: az cosmosdb table role assignment exists --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment list
commands.summary: List all Table role assignments under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment list --account-name
                                       --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb table role assignment list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment show
commands.summary: Show the properties of a Table role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment show --account-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       --role-assignment-id
examples: az cosmosdb table role assignment show --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8

commands.name: az cosmosdb table role assignment update
commands.summary: Update a Table role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb table role assignment update --account-name
                                         --principal-id
                                         --resource-group
                                         --scope
                                         [--role-assignment-id]
                                         [--role-definition-id]
                                         [--role-definition-name]
examples:
az cosmosdb table role assignment update --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-name "My Read Only Role" \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506

az cosmosdb table role assignment update --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
  --role-assignment-id cb8ed2d7-2371-4e3c-bd31-6cc1560e84f8 \
  --role-definition-id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39 \
  --scope "/dbs/mydb/colls/mycontainer" \
  --principal-id 6328f5f7-dbf7-4244-bba8-fbb9d8066506
